title: Dr. Scholl's Severe Cracked Heel Repair Restoring Balm 2.5oz, with 25% Urea for Dry, Cracked Feet, Heals and Moisturizes for Healthy Feet
description: We designed Dr. Scholl’s Severe Cracked Heel Repair Restoring Balm to meet the needs of people who have extremely dry, cracked heels and/or thick, tough skin on the heels, which can be both uncomfortable as well as embarrassing.The dermatologically tested balm is enriched with an ideal amount of urea (25%) that starts working instantly to draw water deep into the skin. It glides on smoothly, hydrating your skin, moisturizing and filling cracks, while leaving an invisible layer of protection. An Epsom salt & essential oils complex helps soothe irritated, dry skin.
